bugRzilla 0.0.90001

Retrieve information about attachments

Source: R/get_attachment.R
get_attachment.Rd

Given an issue or an attachment

get_attachment(issue, attachment, host)

Arguments

issue

Number of the issue.
attachment

A numeric ID of the attachment.
host

URL of the bugzilla instance if missing the R bugzilla is assumed.

Value

A data.frame with the information available.

Examples

get_attachment(issue = 1)

#>               summary is_private size
#> 1 test attachment ...      FALSE  134
#>                                                                                                                                                                                   data
#> 1 I2luY2x1ZGUgPFJpbnRlcm5hbHMuaD4KClNFWFAgbXlFdmFsKFNFWFAgRk4sIFNFWFAgZmlyc3RfYXJnKSB7CiAgcmV0dXJuIGV2YWwoTENPTlMoRk4sIENPTlMoZmlyc3RfYXJnLCBSX05pbFZhbHVlKSksIFJfR2xvYmFsRW52KTsKfQo=
#>   is_obsolete    last_change_time creator id flags is_patch bug_id file_name
#> 1       FALSE 2010-02-16 17:43:29   admin  1    NA    FALSE      1      ed.c
#>         creation_time content_type
#> 1 2010-02-16 17:42:59   text/plain
get_attachment(attachment = 1)

#>   is_patch bug_id file_name flags       creation_time content_type size
#> 1    FALSE      1      ed.c    NA 2010-02-16 17:42:59   text/plain  134
#>                                                                                                                                                                                   data
#> 1 I2luY2x1ZGUgPFJpbnRlcm5hbHMuaD4KClNFWFAgbXlFdmFsKFNFWFAgRk4sIFNFWFAgZmlyc3RfYXJnKSB7CiAgcmV0dXJuIGV2YWwoTENPTlMoRk4sIENPTlMoZmlyc3RfYXJnLCBSX05pbFZhbHVlKSksIFJfR2xvYmFsRW52KTsKfQo=
#>   is_private             summary    last_change_time is_obsolete creator id
#> 1      FALSE test attachment ... 2010-02-16 17:43:29       FALSE   admin  1
